data.name: Throb of Lovegirl: A Ero Waifu TD Demo
data.detailed_description:
üîû A roguelite tower defense game where you help Alpha the warrior in her battles!



Travel the world fighting with the Alpha army, dominate the battlefield strategically positioning your soldiers

Features

  • Choose your path in each game where each terrain has advantages and disadvantages.

  • More than 20 types of soldiers with unique abilities that will help you in battle.

  • Equip your soldiers with a variety of more than 50 weapons divided into pistols, rifles, shotguns, submachine guns, sniper rifles and bazookas.
  • 10 unlockable waifu superpowers.
  • Enemies with special powers that will challenge your strategy in each battle
  • With sexy voice acting

data.short_description: A roguelite tower defense game. Deploy your soldiers and dominate the battlefield with their unique abilities. Choose your path in adventure and make your soldiers grow. Alpha rewards her soldiers üòè

fullgame.name: Throb of Lovegirl: A Ero Waifu TD

data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
